original_text: While there was peace in the land, Asa made the cities of Judah strong and safe. No enemies fought wars against Judah during that time. The Lord gave Asa rest from any trouble.
korean_text: 여호와께서 아사에게 평안을 주셨으므로 그 땅이 평안하여 여러 해 싸움이 없은지라 그가 견고한 성읍들을 유다에 건축하니라

sentences.original_text: While there was peace in the land,
Asa made the cities of Judah strong and safe.
sentences.korean_translation: 아사는 유다의 성읍들을 견고하고 안전하게 만들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: No enemies fought wars against Judah
